Finding Nemo

Rank: 813


After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney- a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.


Director: Andrew Stanton

Writer: Andrew Stanton, Bob Peterson, David Reynolds

Stars: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould

Tags: Animal Adventure, Buddy Comedy, Computer Animation, Quest, Sea Adventure, Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family
